# axios拦截器

# 对axios的一层封装

对axios插件的一层封装，定义超时时间、跨域传输，可以在axios.interceptors.request.use中进行请求时公共参数的携带

base.js

import axios from 'axios'

// 超时时间设置为2秒
axios.defaults.timeout = 5000
// 跨域cookie传输
axios.defaults.withCredentials = true

// http request 拦截器
axios.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    config.params = config.params || {}
    if (!config.params.v) { config.params.v =  'v'}
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') { config.url = config.url.replace(/^https/, 'http') }
    return config
  },
  error => Promise.reject(error)
)

// http response 拦截器
axios.interceptors.response.use(
  response => response,
  error => Promise.reject(error)
)

//axios 请求超时问题
axios.defaults.retry = 3;
axios.defaults.retryDelay = 1000;

axios.interceptors.response.use(undefined, function axiosRetryInterceptor(err) {
    var config = err.config;
    // If config does not exist or the retry option is not set, reject
    if(!config || !config.retry) return Promise.reject(err);
    
    // Set the variable for keeping track of the retry count
    config.__retryCount = config.__retryCount || 0;
    
    // Check if we've maxed out the total number of retries
    if(config.__retryCount >= config.retry) {
        // Reject with the error
        return Promise.reject(err);
    }
    
    // Increase the retry count
    config.__retryCount += 1;
    
    // Create new promise to handle exponential backoff
    var backoff = new Promise(function(resolve) {
        setTimeout(function() {
            resolve();
        }, config.retryDelay || 1);
    });
    
    // Return the promise in which recalls axios to retry the request
    return backoff.then(function() {
        return axios(config);
    });
});



export default axios

使用

import axios from './base.js'

用法和axios一致

# 为axios添加请求方法

基于上面封装的axios的一层扩展，支持get、post二种常用的请求方式

request.js

// 引入刚才封装axios的文件
import axios from './base.js'

// get方法
const FeErrMessage = {
  code: 500,
  message: '接口错误.',
  data: ''
}

function get (url, params) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    try {
      axios.get(url, {
        params: params
      }).then(res => {
        resolve(res.data);
      }).catch(error => {
        resolve(error)
      })
    } catch (error) {
      console.log(error)
      return FeErrMessage
    }
  })
}

function post (url, params) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    try {
      axios.post(url, params).then(res => {
        resolve(res.data);
      }).catch(error => {
        console.log(error)
        resolve(error)
      })
    } catch (error) {
      console.log(error)
      return FeErrMessage
    }
  })
}

使用

import {get, post} from './request.js'

export const testA = params => post(/login, params)

export const testB = params => get(/register, params)

← 验证手机号
